thing-type.label: Thermostat
thing-type.description: Bryant/Carrier Thermostat compatible with Infinitude proxy server.

parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Host
parameter.description: Hostname or IP address of the Infinitude Server.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: Port that the Infinitude Server is listening on.

parameter.name: zone
parameter.label: Zone Number
parameter.description: Zone number that you want your thermostat to control. Choose 1 if you do not have additional zones.

parameter.name: httpPollingInterval
parameter.label: Polling Interval
parameter.description: Override the default polling interval. ( 10 seconds )

channel-type.label: Temperature
channel-type.description: Displays the current temperature for zone 1

channel-type.label: Humidity
channel-type.description: Displays the current humidity for zone 1

channel-type.label: Heat Set Point
channel-type.description: Displays the current heating set point for zone 1

channel-type.label: Cool Set Point
channel-type.description: Displays the current cooling set point for zone 1

channel-type.label: Mode
channel-type.description: Displays the current mode for zone 1

channel-type.label: Activity
channel-type.description: Displays the current activity for zone 1
